title: We are all experiencing it…
body_lines: There is hardly a glimmer of light, at the end of the tunnel, for the local entertainment scene, and those, connected with the showbiz industry, are in dire straits…with hardly any work coming their way.
Sohan and The X-Periments, who generally find themselves with a heavy workload – dances, weddings, sing-along events, etc. – are now experiencing the reality of the situation in the country.

“After a long wait, we did two weddings, that were originally postponed, and then, a week a later, the Nalanda 1990 batch party, said Sohan, adding that people are hardly in the mood to go out because of the crises that we are saddled with.
However, he did say that they enjoyed doing the Nalanda event.
“We had Rajiv Sebastian for company, and a former member of the Shakthi group, and we enjoyed ourselves, keeping the old boys of Nalanda College entertained.
